User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /checkout
Disallow: /carrito
Disallow: /perfil
Disallow: /verify/*
Disallow: /recover_account/*

# Allow search engines to crawl images
Allow: /*.jpg$
Allow: /*.jpeg$
Allow: /*.png$
Allow: /*.gif$

# Crawl-delay directive
Crawl-delay: 10

Sitemap: https://www.everchic.ec/sitemap.xml
